result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Paul Edward Chatfield III

records.addlTxt:
Activity: Preliminary hearing and Arraignment
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

11:38 AM Defendant Paul Edward Chatfield III appeared by phone.  Attorney Robert C Howard Iii appeared by video for Paul Edward Chatfield III.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Parties stipulate to identification of defendant appearing by phone only for today's hearing. Deputy Garrett Whitehead of the Rock County Sheriff's Office sworn testimony taken by video. State moves for bind over, defense objects. Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for filing of an Information. Information filed, copy to Defendant's attorney, reading waived. Defendant's attorney stands mute, not guilty plea entered by Court, jury trial to be set.  Bond to continue.
Preliminary hearing on October 25, 2022 at 11:30 am.

Activity: Adjourned initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

1:51 PM Defendant Paul Edward Chatfield III appeared by video.  Attorney Robert C Howard Iii appeared by video for Paul Edward Chatfield III.  Attorney Noah M Tylenda appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Preliminary hearing requested by Zoom and scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 11:30.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on October 5, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

3:15 PM Defendant Paul Edward Chatfield III appeared by video.  Attorney Robert C Howard Iii appeared by video for Paul Edward Chatfield III.  Prosecuting attorney Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Warrant vacated. Matter continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 1:00 PM.

2:20 PM Defendant Paul Edward Chatfield III not in court.  Attorney Robert C Howard Iii appeared by video for Paul Edward Chatfield III.  Prosecuting attorney Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Court orders warrant on Defendants non appearance, $500 cash. Matter recalled at 3:15 PM.
Preliminary hearing on September 26, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

03:22 PM  Defendant Paul Edward Chatfield III appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Robert C Howard Iii appeared by video for Paul Edward Chatfield III.  Prosecuting attorney Emmeline Lee appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary hearing requested with in time limit by zoom.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

Activity: Initial appearance 
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:19 PM Defendant Paul Edward Chatfield III appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Robert C Howard Iii appeared by attorney Walter Isaacson by video for Paul Edward Chatfield III.  Prosecuting attorney David Zarwell appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address verified. Cash bond set of $500.00 with conditions: No contact with T.T. or C.R. Not to consume or possess a controlled substance without a valid prescription and in prescribed amounts only. Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 3PM.

No contact with T.T. or C.R. Not to consume or possess a controlled substance without a valid prescription and in prescribed amounts only. Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody.
